title: Miscellany
author: Meir ben Baruch, of Rothenburg
description: Contents: Yiśraʼel ben Yosef mi-Ṭuliṭulah's Sefer Mitsṿot zemaniyot (ff. 1-88r). Ḥiya ben Shelomoh Ḥaviv mi-Bartselonah's Shulḥan (ff. 88v-184v). Hilkhot Musar (ff. 185r-199v). Abraham ben David's Shaʻar Ḳedushah (ff. 199v-215r). Hilkhot Derekh Erets (ff. 215v-218r). Meir ben Baruch, of Rothenburg's Sefer Berakhot (ff. 219r-231v). Collection of halakhics (ff. 232v-254r). Note signed by Saʻadiah ben Daʼnan (f. 254v).
